node.title: Top Tips for Entrepreneurial Success- Panel Discussion
node.description: Discover practical entrepreneurial daily habits and learn how to embrace risk to achieve true and impactful success. Explore how the Bible and the writings of Ellen White are the best business books to develop your entrepreneurial career, by aiming for big goals and never settling for the ordinary. Instead of behaving like everybody else and conforming with average results, take action today, and remove luck and chance from your business equation to achieve meaningful entrepreneurial Christian success.
